title: Redevelopment / reconstruction in any zone shall be allowed to be undertaken without going through the process of change of zone
clause_text: Redevelopment / reconstruction in any zone shall be allowed to be undertaken without going through the process of change of zone. However, for the industrial user, the existing segregating distance shall be maintained from the existing industrial unit.
section: (#) Development of Reservations contemplated in Development Plan falling in the area of URC â€“
